about_the_game:
Free from the grasp of a never-ending loop of college, the Lovecraftian monsters of yore are set on reclaiming their past!

Mastering the dark arts of time travel, Caliban has sent you back to before the enslavement of monster-kind! You must make sure that the Battle of Innsmouth goes smoothly this time, and root out the cause of the initial time loop!

Ally yourself with five new party members as you navigate a world where past and present collide! Make choices that will affect the future for monster-kind, such as.... who rules? What does "the future" actually mean now that you are free from the time loop? Will you apply to Grad School? 

Six new story choices can be chosen from, all affecting the outcome! Or will they? Maybe some are just for flavor? You'll have to find that out for yourself.

Ally yourself with five new party members as you navigate a world where past and present collide! Make choices that will affect the future for monster-kind, such as.... who rules? What does "the future" actually mean now that you are free from the time loop? Will you apply to Grad School? 

Six new story choices can be chosen from, all affecting the outcome! Or will they? Maybe some are just for flavor? You'll have to find that out for yourself.

fullgame.name: Tentacle Prawn: (Actually) A Cthulhu Dating Sim

name: Tentacle Prawn: (Actually) A Cthulhu Dating Sim New Game+ Benefits HD
short_description: School's out.... forever! The Lovecraftian monsters of yore now have to contend with a different kind of reality: post-graduation! But this post-grad adventure includes time travel and feuding lords!
